meanings.definition: A former monetary unit of Austria.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in Austria used the ostmark to buy things.
meanings.sent2: The ostmark was the currency of Austria before they switched to the euro.
meanings.sent3: Why did the old coin go to school? To become an ostmark!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as valuable as an ostmark in a sea of pennies.
meanings.sent5: The ostmark jingled in his pocket, a reminder of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: A former name for a region in Germany.
meanings.sent1: The ostmark was the historical name for a region in Germany.
meanings.sent2: People used to refer to that area in Germany as the ostmark.
meanings.sent3: Why did the map refuse to fold? It wanted to keep the ostmark visible!
meanings.sent4: The ostmark of Germany was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The ostmark on the old map sparked his curiosity about history.
